sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who was attending Monday's event at the White House, applauded the move and pointed to a serious uptick in ghost guns being found by police.
author: MICHAEL BALSAMO and ZEKE MILLER Associated Press
title: Biden aims at 'ghost gun' violence with new federal rule

sentence: “It’s long overdue.” Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who also attended the White House announcement, said Philadelphia had seen a nearly 500 percent increase in recovered ghost guns in the past two years.
title: Biden’s solution to the politics of rising crime: Focus on guns
